sentences.english: Furthermore, a portion of space is filled with clay and cementing material .
sentences.chinese: 而且，部分孔隙被粘土和胶结物质填充。

sentences.english: An improved method of measuring effective porosity of rock samples is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种测定岩样有效孔隙度的方法。

sentences.english: Water in microporosity or other small pores.
sentences.chinese: 微孔隙或其它小孔隙中的水。

sentences.english: Water in microporosity or other small pores.
sentences.chinese: 微孔隙或其它小孔隙中的水。

sentences.english: Thirdly the nanoporous random laser is brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了纳米孔隙随机激光器的设想。

sentences.english: Authigenic zeolites are index minerals for the growing band of secondary pores.
sentences.chinese: 自生方沸石是地下次生孔隙发育带的标志矿物。

sentences.english: The application of fractal geometry to characterize the distribution of soil macropores is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了分形几何在确定土壤大孔隙分布中的应用。

sentences.english: Aim To study the secondary porosity in the clastic rock storage of Ordos Basin.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究鄂尔多斯盆地碎屑岩储集体中的次生孔隙。

sentences.english: Triaxial Test, Stress State and Stress Paths, Pore Water Pressure Parameters.
sentences.chinese: 三轴试验，应力状态与应力路径，孔隙水压力系数。

sentences.english: Seismic velocity can occasionally be affected by porosity and temperature.
sentences.chinese: 孔隙率和温度有时也能影响地震波速。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the methods for testing the cancellous bone porosity.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨松质骨孔隙率的测试方法。

sentences.english: It is the porosity due to interconnected pores that can be filled with and emptied of water.
sentences.chinese: 这种孔隙率是水可流出和流入的连通空隙。

sentences.english: And the velocity of slow compressional-wave(P-wave) is in direct proportion to the porosity and the density of fluid.
sentences.chinese: 而慢纵波的速度则和孔隙度和流体的密度成正比。

sentences.english: And under this situation, it is no longer a linear function between relaxation time and pore size.
sentences.chinese: 而且最小模式弛豫时间与孔隙大小为非线性关系。

sentences.english: A problem of strain-induced anisotropy of permeability in media with minute porosity was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究微小孔隙介质中应变导致渗透率各向异性的问题。

sentences.english: It is inevitable to avoid coating porosity because of the working principium of the thermal spraying.
sentences.chinese: 热喷涂的工作原理决定了其涂层孔隙是不可避免的。

definition: porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)
to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
